news.title: Watch My Chemical Romance Debut New Song “War Beneath the Rain”
news.summary: Gerard Way and the reunited band premiered the track, written before their breakup, at Los Angeles’ Dodger Stadium

news.title: William Basinski Announces Deluxe Reissue of The Disintegration Loops
news.summary: The 8xLP set was remastered by Josh Bonati and includes a foreword by Laurie Anderson

news.title: Cate Le Bon, Joanne Robertson, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
news.summary: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat

news.title: Girlpool’s Avery Tucker Announces Debut Solo Album, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: Paw features contributions from Alaska Reid, Muna’s Katie Gavin, A. G. Cook, and Porches’ Aaron Maine
